description.stateful: Cancels {0} intents at the start of the player's turn. <c=downside>Decreases by 1 at end of turn.</c>
description.stateless: Cancels intents at the start of the player's turn. <c=downside>Decreases by 1 at end of turn.</c>

Oxidation.name: Oxidation
Oxidation.description: If oxidation is {0} or more at end of turn, gain 1 <c=status>CORRODE</c> and set oxidation to 0.

Redraw.name: Redraw
Redraw.description: Lets you discard a card and draw a new one. Costs 1 redraw per discard.

Spontaneous.name: Triggered This Turn
Spontaneous.description: This card's <c=action>Spontaneous</c> actions already triggered this turn.

description.upgrade: This card becomes unupgraded at the end of combat.
description.downgrade: This card reverts to its original upgrade at the end of combat.
description.sidegrade: This card reverts to its original upgrade at the end of combat.

player.name: {0} Cost
player.description: Lose <c=keyword>{0}</c> <c=status>{1}</c>. If you don't have enough, this action does not happen.

enemy.name: Exploit {0}
enemy.description: Remove <c=keyword>{0}</c> <c=status>{1}</c> from the enemy. If they don't have enough, this action does not happen.

energy.name: Energy Cost
energy.description: Lose <c=keyword>{0}</c> extra <c=energy>ENERGY</c>. If you don't have enough, this action does not happen.

conditional.name: Conditional
conditional.description: This action will only trigger if {0}.

Formal.GreaterThanOrEqual: {0} is greater than or equal to {1}
Formal.LessThanOrEqual: {0} is less than or equal to {1}

EnemyState.GreaterThanOrEqual: your enemy is at least at {1} {0}
EnemyState.LessThanOrEqual: your enemy is at most at {1} {0}

EnemyPossession.NotEqual: your enemy does not have exactly {1} {0}

PossessionComparison.Equal: you have the same amount of {0} and {1}
PossessionComparison.NotEqual: you have a different amount of {0} and {1}
PossessionComparison.GreaterThanOrEqual: you have at least as much {0} as {1}
PossessionComparison.LessThanOrEqual: you have at most as much {0} as {1}

EnemyPossessionComparison.Equal: your enemy has the same amount of {0} and {1}
EnemyPossessionComparison.NotEqual: your enemy has a different amount of {0} and {1}
EnemyPossessionComparison.GreaterThanOrEqual: your enemy has at least as much {0} as {1}
EnemyPossessionComparison.LessThanOrEqual: your enemy has at most as much {0} as {1}

ToEnemyPossessionComparison.Equal: you have the same amount of {0} as your enemy
ToEnemyPossessionComparison.NotEqual: you have a different amount of {0} than your enemy
ToEnemyPossessionComparison.GreaterThan: you have more {0} than your enemy
ToEnemyPossessionComparison.LessThan: you have less {0} than your enemy
ToEnemyPossessionComparison.GreaterThanOrEqual: you have at least as much {0} as your enemy
ToEnemyPossessionComparison.LessThanOrEqual: you have at most as much {0} as your enemy

energyVariableHint: <c=action>X</c> = Your <c=status>ENERGY</c> after paying for this card{0}.

energy.name: Energy
energy.description: How much <c=energy>ENERGY</c> you have remaining this turn.

continue.name: Continue
continue.description: Trigger the next actions. If this is not triggered, the next actions will not be either.

stop.name: Stop
stop.description: Stop triggering the next actions. If this is not triggered, the next actions will trigger as usual.

onDiscard.name: On Discard
onDiscard.description: This action only triggers whenever this card is discarded during your turn without playing it.

onTurnEnd.name: On Turn End
onTurnEnd.description: This action only triggers when you end your turn with this card in hand.

spontaneous.name: Spontaneous
spontaneous.description: This action only triggers whenever a turn starts with this card in hand, or if it's drawn for the first time this turn.
